annotation.spannedText: You should consult a health care provider or visit a travel health clinic preferably six weeks before you travel

classMention.mentionClass: You should consult a health care provider or visit a travel health clinic preferably six weeks before you travel

annotation.spannedText: This is an opportunity to: review your immunization history make sure your provincial/territorial vaccination schedule is up-to-date discuss any trip-related health concerns you may have assess your needs based on where you plan to travel and what you plan to do

classMention.mentionClass: This is an opportunity to: review your immunization history make sure your provincial/territorial vaccination schedule is up-to-date discuss any trip-related health concerns you may have assess your needs based on where you plan to travel and what you plan to do

annotation.spannedText: Use the reference below to determine which vaccinations may be recommended or required for your destination

classMention.mentionClass: Use the reference below to determine which vaccinations may be recommended or required for your destination

annotation.spannedText: It is important for travellers to contact a designated Yellow Fever Vaccination Centre well in advance of their trip to ensure that the vaccine is available

classMention.mentionClass: It is important for travellers to contact a designated Yellow Fever Vaccination Centre well in advance of their trip to ensure that the vaccine is available
